events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the purchase as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
Support ticket has been assigned to agent Emily for further handling of refund request.
Hello! I’m Emily and I’ll be helping you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, could you kindly share the order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received?
Thank you for the prompt response. My order number is 987654321 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product sent.
We have reviewed your case and will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your help with the refund process.
Your refund request has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved from our side.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there are any further issues.
Since no further concerns have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
